meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Clint Stiffler Stephanie Jass Mike Lonesky Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6451.

td.p: Clint Stiffler, an attorney from Dallas, Texas
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan
Mike Lonesky, a federal investigator from Clinton, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,401)

tr.td: THE 1912 PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION
CINEMANIA
FIRST NAME FILL-IN
RAY BRADBURY
FESTIVALS
THE OED SAYS IT'S...
